splits a single combined control signal into control signals for heating coil, mixing box and cooling coil More...

#include "spark.h"

Include dependency graph for uSplitter.cc:

Detailed Description

splits a single combined control signal into control signals for heating coil, mixing box and cooling coil

Interface variables
  • PORT s1 [-] "u split point between CC and MX";
  • PORT s2 [-] "u split point between MX and HC";
  • PORT uCombined [-] "combined control signal";
  • PORT uCC [-] "CC control signal";
  • PORT uMX [-] "MX control signal";
  • PORT uHC [-] "HC control signal";
Functions
 uCC,uMX,uHC = uSplitter(s1,s2,uCombined)

History
B Coffey Feb8-08
  • Initial implementation.
  • B Coffey, Sep24-08 - fixed MX operation so that OA damper always at minimum position during CC operation
